title: Episode #91: How red light therapy can improve mental & brain health, help with sleep issues,  reduce brain damage from traumatic brain injuries and so much more!
description:
In this episode I interview Wes from Joovv on all things red light therapy, what it is, how it can help with our memory and cognition, and how it can improve our mood, sleep, and so much more!
-
For more info on Joovv and to get your special offer go to: www.joovv.com/drleaf
-
To get your free week on Blinkist go to: https://blinkist.com/drleaf
